website_summaries.verdict: A solid hardwood shaker-style bench that looks lovely.
pros: For a price this low, it's hard to find a bench that's truly solid wood
This bench looks great and holds up well
Many customers found that it also works well as a coffee table
Measures 44 inches wide by 14 inches deep by 18 inches high
cons: Some customers had trouble getting the legs to screw in properly

customer_reviews.title: Stain comes off
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. It's been months and when you sit on it oil stain still comes off when wiped or on your clothes. Constantly having to tighten the screws that hold this together. Liked the ideal of a bench instead of chairs at table because you can fit three kids instead of just two but don't wear white or a bright color unless you want to wear brown stain on your bottom after sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and beautiful bench for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the last bench we got (tho' I don't remember where we got the last bench). Our last bench was the same width as this bench, but on our old bench, the legs were placed too close together, so the bench sometimes felt like it would tip over if you didn't center yourself exactly when sitting down.. This bench has the legs placed all the way in the corners, the screws are reinforced with metal rather than going straight into the wood, and feels very sturdy. We love the appearance as well as the durability of this bench.
customer_reviews.author: MMom

customer_reviews.title: Well made.  Wood stain a very bright golden oak.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made sturdy table. The finish looks beautiful. The sitting surface is not a solid piece but many small rectangular prisms glued together. It looks good. Just be ware, the wood stain color is a very very bright golden oak. The color on the photo is much darker than what it really is. It is really quite yellow.
customer_reviews.author: AstuteBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bench to complete our dining set
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the shaker style bench to match the Boraam shaker table and our existing four chairs (see the picture- the chairs were already ours). The quality is great, very sturdy, cleans easily (which is important as I have four kids) and the finish matches the rest of our dining room perfectly. The packaging was good- the box was slightly dented but the bench was perfect. Assembly took less than 15 minutes. I'm very pleased- the bench and matching table are a terrific deal!
customer_reviews.author: E. Carter

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: The bench is solid, versatile, beautiful, and affordable. I use it for my digital piano Yamaha DGX660. It is a little longer than I want, but it serves the purpose very well. It is the most solid and good looking bench, IMHO, in this price range. One thing I don't like: there are two deep cuts on the other side of the bench (see picture). I took out a stars because of those two cuts.
customer_reviews.author: ironbadge

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood.  Nice Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Love price Solid wood...no particle board here. If you're looking for s bench do not overlook this one. SOLID WOOD...I am thrilled with this and I can't believe the price.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Well-made bench for a farm table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench to update a farm table in our dining room . We received it faster than it originally said which was a good thing . It is well built and looks very nice . It is a comfortable bench and nice that it allows a little bit extra seating on one side of a farm table - I think it would be perfect for children however after reading previous posts they need to make sure they are sitting on the bench properly to avoid it tipping . We have not had any problems with the bench tipping
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good looking piece
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with an oak table that we have had for years. I decided on a bench instead of extra chairs in an effort to save some money and I'm glad I did! The bench is very sturdy and super easy to assemble. It literally had 4 legs, 4 bolts and 8 washers and came with the hex key to screw them in with. It maybe took me 5 minutes to assemble. It looks amazing and is perfect for my grandkids (I can fit 3 of them comfortably with 2 of them in booster seats. I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: ericandretta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together! Beautiful wood!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any problem with these benches sliding out from underneath me or my kids, which was my main concern based on the other reviews. They are more orange in color than the rest of my furniture, so I don't usually have them in the dining room where they were intended, but at least I have more seating when we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Solid but very orange.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bench, solid and easy to put together. The oak color is extremely orange/yellow. Normally I'm a big fan of oak but I wish I would have gotten it in walnut. I will get some gel stain to put over it to change the color. Other than that - good bench.
customer_reviews.author: someone's mom

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for one of our broken and unstable dining room chairs. Very stable and constructed well in the good old USA. Can't beat the price and it matches our oak table perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. John mcclain

customer_reviews.title: Attractive bench at a low cost
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this attractive bench in front of a south window for all my plants during the winter months. The top is a golden oak which matches the trim in our home. The bench is very nice looking and is sturdy. I was impressed with how it looked after my husband put it together. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for such a sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: My four chair kitchen set recently became too small when we had our 3rd child. I was looking for an option that 2 of my kids could use on one side of our dining room table. This bench is high quality and I was surprised at how sturdy it is. It's long enough for 3 small kids to use at our table. The light oak wood is a little darker than I was hoping but it still matches well with my chairs. Well worth it for the price. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: audreyf82

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality shaker bench at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shaker bench at a good price! I shopped around and Amazon had the best price for a shaker bench of this size & quality! We actually used it as shelving underneath our TV to hold some of our electronic equipment & it worked great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish, great value
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for the end of my bed, to have a place to sit and put on shoes. It was easy to assemble, took longer to open the box than to put in the bolts! Clear finish on oak with black legs - the finish was beautiful - smooth and clear. It's heavy and solid - no rickety back-and-forth feel when you sit. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lee W.

customer_reviews.title: More orange than expected
customer_reviews.text: The bench structure and wood was great. I was trying to match it to my set that I thought was similar in color. However, the finish color was more orange and didn't look good against my apricot colored wall. I did not assemble it and returned it instead. If it had been the correct color, I would have been super pleased with this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Practicality

customer_reviews.title: Too Orange to be Oak
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy bench, easy to assemble. Too orange to be considered honey oak but it’s just going in my laundry room. Came with a broken washer (minor inconvenience) but worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: really nice bench that only comes in one color
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hardwood bench. I wish it came in other colors... But it's great. I think the quality of the wood is better than my kitchen table that I bought it for! It's really nice- but it doesn't match exactly. It's really hard to find this style bench in the color I wanted and the length I needed. It would be perfection if they offered it in different shades/stains.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with my bench
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my bench! It's exactly what I was looking for. The entire process from the beginning was so easy and prompt delivery. Thank you, K Travalini
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Travalini

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal!
customer_reviews.text: These matched well with my existing dining table. I have a large family and this maximizes my seating capacity without losing style and VERY reasonably priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: E. Clausen

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: we want a bench by the dining room window. this one serves our purpose well. when we have guests they can sit on it, when no one is around the cats can enjoy the sun on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bench! Fits perfectly in my travel trailer. Easier to get in and out of than chairs. Grandkids fit on it! Sturdy and vey easy to put together! Finish is very nice and looks like it will hold up to heavy use. (Grandchildren). Absolutely beautiful wooden top and black legs. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: COWGIRL37

customer_reviews.title: Sold bench with excellent customer service from Boraam
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy dudy bench. Outstanding customer service from Boraam. Bench arrived with small damage to one leg. Boraam customer service was happy to send me a new leg. For the time being I was able to sand it down and color with a wood crayon. It appeared to be packaging damage and not from shipping. Finish is a little thin but the bench is solid wood and easy to work with. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D Fields

customer_reviews.title: Huge bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is more than I expected. I ordered the walnut and it matches my table perfectly. It is a warm orange walnut and just glows. Easy to assemble. Even had my 5 year old help me and he had a great time working with real tools. Real wood! This is hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t use the tool that came with them but they were easily assembled and are stable benches. They are very sturdy holding my 200 pound guys.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe the low price on this beautiful high quality bench. If you get the oak, know that it does have a significant orange tint. Simple to assemble, just attach legs. Good solid bench!
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy, and good looking Too!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is so sturdy! It looks nice with my Shaker style furniture, and I bring it out from the bedroom to use as extra seating at the dining table when guests come. Two can sit on it comfortably! It is an exceptional value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: George P. Laufer

customer_reviews.title: Rock steady
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy bench! Very easy and quick to throw together, and it looks great to-boot. I am a fairly massive human being and it feels rock solid to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Craig K

customer_reviews.title: Are definitely orange
customer_reviews.text: Were very easy and quick to put together, are very sturdy, perfect size for our needs as extra cottage dining seating. Are definitely not the normal brown-ish oak color, are definitely orange. Have a house full of antiques of all shades of oak and these aren't, but are perfect for our cottage needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it’s a great
customer_reviews.text: The color is a lot more orange than in the pictures. That is basically my only issue with it. Other than that, it’s a great bench
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Bench
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of online searching I finally found the perfect bench. We’ve placed it on our small front porch and it looks lovely. Not all washers were included. We had to buy some extra to fasten the legs.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bench...As Advertised !!
customer_reviews.text: EASY 2construct. Color As Advertised. Dimensions As Advertised. What A Quality Table. Even Has Built-in Leg Coasters 2protect Floor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good in restaurant
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for my restaurant business, this bench is useful for my customer and can be waiting area.
customer_reviews.author: Siri🌺

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The quality is FAR better than I expected. I am used to buying craftman-made furniture and didn't think this would be someone I would be thrilled with. But it is very well made. And the legs attached in such a way as to make them very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good construction and finish
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually really impressed with this. I bought a table from Crate and Barrel and picked up 3 chairs but the matching bench was on back order. I started looking around for alternatives and discovered this, which perfectly matches the table, is about 25% of the price of the one from C&B, and is really good quality. It's very solid and heavy with good construction and a nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Max C. B. Dyckhoff

customer_reviews.title: Good Bench
customer_reviews.text: The box came really beat up and some parts were open, which was odd. However, the actual bench itself was in excellent condition and was very easy to put together using the included tools! It is study enough for me to feel comfortable sitting on it and not too high for my students to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cooperme114

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench. Exactly what I'd hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench. Exactly what I'd hoped for. Sturdy and doesn't wobble, easy assembly and solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose but oak color is off.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is fine, serves the purposely extra seating at our kitchen table, however, the color of oak seat is NOT ideal. Very orange in appearance, and looks funny. We are sanding it down and putting a different finish on it, the contrast between our oak floors and the oak seat is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Motsenbocker

customer_reviews.title: Was looking for a bench to fit our table and ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a bench to fit our table and make more room, there was a scratch in the wood but nothing to noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a plant bench and several reviews used it for the same thing. I normally always buy oak but all the reviews said it was more orange colored so I got the walnut which was the perfect color. It was very easy to assemble by myself and it is very solid. I’m very pleased with this purchase and it came very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M.D. Ashline

customer_reviews.title: Good bench.
customer_reviews.text: These benches are solid and they look great. I have to say one of my kids flipped off it and hurt himself, but to be honest he was perched on his feet on the bench and tried to pull it across a tile floor. It's a good bench, possibly not the best for frequent use with kids at the dining room table with a tile floor, but maybe your kids aren't such acrobats. One bench arrived with a broken joist that made it very wobbly; after contact with the company an entire new bench was promptly sent out. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Super.
customer_reviews.text: It saves a lot of space in my dining room. It is also very stable, and strong enough. Also super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: shangus

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, solid coffee table. Easy to put together. The narrow width makes it great for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Orange - not “Oak”
customer_reviews.text: Build quality fine. Made in Vietnam. Measures 44”w x 14”d x 18”h. Nylon discs on the legs make it slide around on my oak floor. Stain color is a honey orange - not even close to the “oak” color I expected. Let’s see if Amazon and the vendor will correct their product descriptions... Too much trouble to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our table
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick, arrived in perfect condition and set up was extremely easy! Color is beautiful and was exactly what we were hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered this product. For the price it is quite solid and attractive looking. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood. Very sturdy and absolutely love the wood. I am very happy with this bench. And for the price, I feel it's a great value. Well done !
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen serge

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews due to laziness. However, the quality of this bench for the price is awesome. The color/stain is a bit more on the orange side but it made well and very sturdy. Construction is super easy! I'm satisfied with this purchase and recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: great as a coffee table
customer_reviews.text: We needed a simple coffee/book table which was not too expensive. We try to keep to a minimalist and clean lines approach to decorating. This bench fits our aesthetics and does what we need. It is solid wood and is the right size for our living room in a light color which helps keep the living room bright and airy.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Color is a bit “orange” but it works for our space. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: JMag22

customer_reviews.title: Thanks solid wood and sturdy bench looks great in my kitchen save space less ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks solid wood and sturdy bench looks great in my kitchen save space less chairs I totally recommend this bench. Paulette BX NY
customer_reviews.author: Paulette M. Roper

customer_reviews.title: Not too Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The price was nice, it came with the tools needed. One of the legs after being screwed in tightly was still wobbly.. when I checked, the female adapter came out of the socket and doesn't stay put. No bueno. I had apply hard putty and wood glue to get that thing stuck in place for good. Once it did, I screwed it back in and no more wobble. Yay. Sounds like it could have been a manufacturing error?? Who knows, but for the price, I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Maliyalyn

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty, sturdy, easy to assemble, and matches my table perfectly. I only gave it a 4 stars because it had a scratch straight out of the box. I have kids so I'm sure it will get a few more scratches but it was disappointing to receive it blemished.
customer_reviews.author: KNB85

customer_reviews.title: Very orange oak color
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It is a good size, sturdy and wide. Comfortably seats 3 children or 2 adults. Con: It is very orange colored oak. Will have to try and find a way to refinish it as it does not match my actual oak table at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited over our new shaker benchI
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked for the perfect yet inexpensive bench for our kitchen nook. I saw this Boraam 36136 Shaker Bench, Oak and fell in love with it immediately. It was very easy to put together and I absolutely love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabin Bench!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bench...perfect length, height, and depth! Color blends perfectly with logs inside the cabin! Boots store underneath easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. My kids love it. My husband and I are very satisfied with this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is solid. I like it but its a lot lighter than the photo so I'll be refinishing it so it will match the rest of our furniture.
customer_reviews.author: nolegirl7

customer_reviews.title: Practical and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bench made of hard wood and imported from Vietnam. Assembly instructions were easy to follow and was easily assembled in 30 minutes. It came nicely packed
customer_reviews.author: nlr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, wasy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Oak color is fine and the bench looks good. The bench was easy to assemble, the only tool needed was an allen wrench which was included. There were no assembly instructions but the steps are only to attach the legs, which was simple. The completed bench is sturdy, and I know it holds up to at least 225 pounds and I'm sure it will hold more. The bench will be used as a plant table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love the color.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two. The first bench was perfect. The second bench was a little warped. On of the legs did not go all the way to the floor, so we but a new longer peg in the bottom of one of the legs to make it touch on all fours. Over all we love the benches.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and we've had no issues with them
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these oak stained benches for our extra long farmhouse style table. The oak stain is a shade darker then the table, which adds to the look. They are sturdy and we've had no issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: wifenmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, love the bench
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy, wood. I added a pillow top with some foam and fabric but looks perfect as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bench
customer_reviews.text: This is very quick to assemble. Just screw in the legs and your done. Very sturdy bench. Fits a desk that I use to homeschool my two girls. Would be great for small kitchen table. Just check measurements for length. Fits two adults comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Dining Bench
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bench. It is sturdy and just the right color. It fit perfectly behind the dining table for extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: superfranny

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy bench with an awesome oak color.
customer_reviews.text: I love my bench. I placed in my entryway with a beautiful wall mirror above it. I received compliments from my husband and family. It is much more sturdier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: The bench is nice and sturdy (after you remove those annoying little plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: The bench is nice and sturdy (after you remove those annoying little plastic feet things). But the bench is not the color shown in the picture. its very "orangey" tinted. The picture makes it look like a nice deep brown, so unfortunately it does not match my table as well as i would have liked. But overall it is a good quality bench!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench, well priced
customer_reviews.text: This bench matches our dining table perfectly and provided a much-needed seating solution for our two kids. The regular chairs for our table were too heavy for them to reliably pull in and out which was a thrice-daily hassle. I was actually looking for a whole new set with lighter chairs when I saw this and realized I could extend the life of our existing (and pricey) set. Problem solved! And for cheap!
customer_reviews.author: D's mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my small dining table! Solid and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, very nice looking, easy to put together bench. I bought it to put my plants when I bring them in for the winter and it fits perfectly. I may decide to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cheap. It was easy to put together, but it doesn't look high end. It's nice enough to put in a corner for some extra seating, I may sew a cushion to put on top of it, to cover up the cheap looking fake wood. Overall I'd say its pretty sturdy, but there aren't any large people in our family that sit on it. It was cheap, so I can't really have too many complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ReginaMM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bench
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sturdy bench for the price. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Warning for "wood dust"
customer_reviews.text: I did actually open the box and all materials to put it together. While assembling, I noticed the warning on the bottom of the bench, but ended up completing the project. After I thought about it, I decided that I didn't want me or my guests to take a chance. So I returned it. .
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Solid but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Came in wrong stain, twice. Ridiculously solid construction and quality
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't anything close to walnut color or the color pictured. The bench I received was orange.
customer_reviews.author: sjphoto

customer_reviews.title: This worked perfectly for my intended purpose which was to ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for my intended purpose which was to serve as a small coffee table with the multi- function capability of use as a bench for my dining room table.
customer_reviews.author: gl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful sturdy heavy bench. Thank you to the builders in Viet Nam. Will recommend to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthb

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and solid
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bench and it fits great directly beneath a tall picture window as a plant stand. Easy enough to put together and feels very sturdy. The seat was a little deeper in color than I thought it would be. Even though it doesn't really match our oak wood floors perfectly, it's a nice piece of furniture and I'm happy with this purchase! Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon103

customer_reviews.title: The Price is reasonable, for such nice indoor bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully made wood bench, shiny wood sooth as glass, you just has to attach legs. Nothing like some with laminate! Great price, for a lovely bench
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged twice. The first time, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged twice. The first time, the wood was cracked where the bolts are screwed into the legs. The second time, it has a large gash in the seat. For the price, I may just put a chair pad on the seat to cover it. But it is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my new benches
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new benches! They are made very well for the price and it cost me way less than buying a whole new dining set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and very good looking. Holds up well with very frequent and high usage. Would highly recommend for home or commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: EricaJordan Smith

customer_reviews.title: We are keeping this items since the effort to return ...
customer_reviews.text: We are keeping this items since the effort to return it would out weight the cost of this item but I may have to do some refinishing on this. It is a bit orange looking.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, pretty easy to put together, but a bit orange for my liking. Doesn't really match my dining table although the stain looked identical in the photo. Good price for solid wood, though.
customer_reviews.author: lunchboxangel

customer_reviews.title: happy to sit this bench
customer_reviews.text: I got this bench to have for extra seating at the dining table. It was a breeze to assemble and is very solid. The height matches the dining table chairs just right. I think it is just a solid as benches for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Underdog

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy bench but very orangey color
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy bench but very orangey color. Does not match my oak table well at all. But the thing that angered me the most was...ONCE AGAIN....my PRIME shipping was not 2 days but 5! AND ,since it was handed over to the USPS, we had to go to the Post Office to pick it up! To further complicate delivery issues our Rural mail carrier LIED about attempting to deliver it. (Guess she forgot about those security cameras we have pointed at our driveway and mailbox.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench was very easy to put together and is very sturdy. It matches my table perfect and allows 3 people to sit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Match Boraam Shaker Table
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I have the Boraam shaker table in oak and wanted the matching bench. The table is very nice and is a light oak color. This bench is an unattractive red color, not at all a match to the table. Cymax vendor has this at a good price but the merchandise is not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Close enough and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt match the rest of the table set, but didnt think I could find something that could. Close enough and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Janine D

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Very Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This piece not only is functional and versatile, but it looks great and is sturdy as well. This didn't take that long to assemble - had fun putting it together. All you do is screw the legs in, and viola! A great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Empathy

customer_reviews.title: Dining room bench.
customer_reviews.text: The bench has been a wonderful addition to my dining room. It matches perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S Henry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood! It's easy to essemble
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood! It's easy to essemble, not too heavy and very durable. Great quality for you buck!! It can sit 3 people, but more comfortably 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for my table
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size for my table, tucking between the legs like it's meant to be. Sturdy enough to handle my 4 kids, though light enough to manage. Wipes well. Hasn't tipped or anything yet. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AccordingtoHez

customer_reviews.title: Bad color IRL
customer_reviews.text: The stain on this is BAD. Looks orange and cheap. That said it does the job but the legs need to be tightened regularly, because kids.
customer_reviews.author: Raudel orozco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and well made and great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: T. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Will work
customer_reviews.text: Color lighter than expected so couldn’t use in the room planned but easy to assemble and can be used as seating in another room
customer_reviews.author: Glorya H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the picture. Solid. Easy to build. Might be buying a second one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great benches!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and sturdy. My only complaint is that the stain is a little orange looking.
customer_reviews.author: Erika DiBello

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews before purchasing these benches (I purchased two) I told my wife that I may have to reinforce and glue the legs as some of the reviews thought the benches were flimsy. I received them today took them out of the boxes and assembled them very easily. I was pleasantly surprised as to how sturdy they are and my concerns over reinforcing the legs proved to be unfounded. As I said I only received them today but I don't forsee any problems with them and would recommend them, if someone asked.
customer_reviews.author: E.J. Mack

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful bench, well crafted and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bench, well crafted and comfortable.. defiantly worth the money would buy from this product again
customer_reviews.author: Naloni Miller

product_meta.title: Boraam Shaker Bench, Oak
product_meta.description: Color:OakThe Shaker Bench in Oak from Boraam Industries features... Durable solid hardwood construction. Simple shaker design. Comfortable seat with sturdy legs. Solid hardwood for strength and stability. 44" x 14' size perfect for dining tables, mudrooms, entryways. Boraam Industries was established in 2001 and is renowned for quality furniture in a classic, casual style. Boraam provides well-styled, high-quality home furnishings and furniture at affordable prices. Their highly qualified team comes with many years of experience in the furniture industry and the result is elegant classical and contemporary designs at a very reasonable price. From bar stools to pub tables, baker's racks to dinette sets and much, much more-Boraam Industries will have what you're looking for. Recommended for residential use only.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 18 in. H x 44 in. W x 15 in. D
All tools are included for assembly
